about_the_game:
Differences from the retail version

In the demo version, you can watch the opening and play stages 1 to 3 of the main game.
However, stages 4 to 6 and the EX stages are not unlocked.

[img{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/GIFforDEMO.gif][/img]

Story

Fed up with unavoidable double ads before videos,
the protagonist decides to entera shooting game (shmup) where shooting down ads is the goal.
Completing all stages promises an ad-free experience for a while, but is it really that simple?

Bosses are Advertisers from Fictional Companies

Bosses attack using their company products as bullet-hell advertisements.
Note: Objects resembling hamburgers, cars, and realtors are advertisements and not actual food, vehicles, or people.

Full Japanese Voice Acting[[/h2]
Voice Cast:
Kyōhei Natsume / Haruki Asada / Yūki Amezawa / Daisuke Hirakawa / Masahiro Yamanaka

Note: The English version will include Japanese audio with English subtitles.
Note: The characters voiced by Yamanaka will not appear in the trial version. If you would like to hear Yamanaka's voice, please wait for the release of the full version.

Beginner-Friendly Shmup

Recommended even for those who usually don't play shmup. An Easy mode is available, and you can also increase the number of continues from the settings menu. The protagonist's life is based on an HP gauge, so you can take more hits than it seems.

Ads Aren't the Enemy

Defeating bosses earns you skills that can be used in subsequent stages.
Not shooting down ads — pausing your shots — can also prove beneficial.

Score Attack

Global score rankings are categorized by difficulty level.
Advanced shooters, aim for the world's top score in Hard mode.

Note:The leaderboards from the demo version will not be carried over to the full version.
Note: The rankings may be reset midway through the game until the system stabilizes. Thank you for your understanding.

Bug Report Request

If you encounter any bugs or issues, or have any requests or feedback, please contact us through the "SUPPORT" (email form) on the official website, the support email address, or DM us on X.

name: Ad SHOOt（アドシュー） Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 23H2
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700K CPU @ 3.70GHz 3.70 GHz
  • Memory: 32.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 24 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio

short_description: A 2D vertical scrolling bullet-hell shooter game(SHMUP) where you shoot down fictional advertisements. The demo version allows you to play 3 of the 7 stages.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
